ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: This is just wrong Minkin!  Been going to hate for over a year and still no BP :p  Congrats on your luck! ... Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Ayonae Ro server 55th level
ygData.messageBody:
This is just wrong Minkin! Been going to hate for over a year and still no
BP :p Congrats on your luck!

-------------------------------------------------
Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Ayonae Ro server
55th level Wood Elf Troubador

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://eqsongs.com/


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 6:58 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Hate
>
>
> Well the guild im in is planning to go up to hate this week. But this
> weekend i got an invite from a friend that was allready in
> hate so i figured
> i'd gate up early....
>
> Friday night: was allready empty zone practically (1-2 mobs
> on track) when i
> got there, my friend's guild was in maestro hall, we
> proceeded to pull the
> area, another bard logged in (that was in his guild) she got
> a helm and
> martune rapier. I have no complaints though, my group was
> the xp group once
> i started chanting, made almost a full bub. Got tired
> afterwards, had to get
> some shut eye...
>
> Saturday morning: join up with another guild up there, 2
> other bards in
> zone, one of which had a full suit, other had bp/arms/gloves.
> The one that
> needed pieces went LD just before we pull a banshee, never
> came back, i got
> boots.
>
> Sunday morning: join up with yet another guild up there,
> kill a couple
> mobs, 2 cr's later and 2 banshees, i got myself a bp woot!
>
> All in all i guess im a lucky bard in hate so far, even won a
> lotto on a
> ruby crown (money money money). Only thing i really care to
> get from the
> zone now is legs and lute and maybe a diamond if i'm really
> lucky, and maybe
> a martune rapier would be nice in offhand. I really cant
> complain, so far
> with this char my hate experience has been quite positive
>
> Wonder what i'll get this week 8)
>
> Minkin
> lev 48 bard
> Ayonae Ro
>
>
> --- In eqbards@y..., Rebecca Small <rsmall@c...> wrote:
> > Strangely enough, I've spent only one full day in Hate. I was the
> only bard
> > all day as I recall. I got the boots, BP and a Martune rapier. I've
> only
> > been back once for just a few hours, it was mostly clean and we
> just went to
> > lend a hand to the crew finishing up after some folks had to camp.
> No bard
> > stuff dropped either time from the Maestro.
> >
> > Oh btw, I've found wisps really really hate clerics. I haven't seen
> the like
> > since they turned down bard hate. Twice last night in WC my L10
> cleric was
> > ganged by wisps. I started on one, another dove in when the first
> was mostly
> > dead, then it was about dead a third and then a fourth jumped in! I
> only saw
> > the one wisp when I started the fight. I had to run. Later, I
> started on
> > another one and in about 2 minutes, I had five live wisps chase me
> to the
> > zoneline after I killed the first one! Have you ever seen a wisp
> train? I
> > had zoned in and out between fights so there couldn't have been any
> leftover
> > aggro.
> >
> > Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> > Excalibur, Xegony
>
>
>

> lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
